cardiology_consultation.name: Cardiology Consultation
cardiology_consultation.description: Comprehensive heart and cardiovascular system evaluation
cardiology_consultation.what_is_included: Complete cardiac history, physical examination, ECG if needed, consultation with cardiologist
cardiology_consultation.how_its_done: Doctor will evaluate your cardiovascular health through clinical examination and discussion. Additional tests may be ordered based on findings.
cardiology_consultation.special_preparation: Wear comfortable clothing. Avoid caffeine 1 hour before appointment. Bring any previous ECG or cardiac reports.

gastroenterology_consultation.name: Gastroenterology Consultation
gastroenterology_consultation.what_is_included: Detailed digestive history, abdominal examination, discussion of symptoms, treatment recommendations
gastroenterology_consultation.how_its_done: The gastroenterologist will examine you and discuss your digestive health concerns. Tests may be recommended based on your symptoms.
gastroenterology_consultation.special_preparation: Light meal the night before. Avoid alcohol 24 hours before. Fast for 4 hours before appointment.

abdominal_ultrasound.name: Abdominal Ultrasound
abdominal_ultrasound.what_is_included: Complete abdominal ultrasound with detailed images of liver, kidneys, pancreas, spleen, and other organs
abdominal_ultrasound.how_its_done: Painless ultrasound procedure using gel and probe. Takes about 30 minutes. Results explained during appointment.
abdominal_ultrasound.special_preparation: Fast 6-8 hours before appointment. Drink water to fill bladder. Wear loose, comfortable clothing.

blood_analysis.name: Complete Blood Analysis
blood_analysis.what_is_included: Blood collection, complete blood count (CBC), metabolic panel, lipid profile, liver and kidney function tests
blood_analysis.how_its_done: Blood sample drawn by phlebotomist. Lab analysis takes 24-48 hours. Results provided with physician consultation.
blood_analysis.special_preparation: Fasting recommended (8-12 hours). Come early in the morning. Drink plenty of water.

dermatology_checkup.name: Dermatology Check-up
dermatology_checkup.what_is_included: Full skin examination, assessment of any skin conditions, skin type analysis, treatment recommendations
dermatology_checkup.how_its_done: Dermatologist will examine your skin visually and provide recommendations. Photos may be taken for record.
dermatology_checkup.special_preparation: Come with clean skin, no makeup. Avoid sun exposure 24 hours before. Wear comfortable, accessible clothing.

general_checkup.name: General Health Checkup
general_checkup.what_is_included: Full physical examination, vital signs, health history review, general health assessment
general_checkup.how_its_done: Complete physical examination with general practitioner covering all major body systems.
general_checkup.special_preparation: Wear comfortable clothing. Bring medical history if available. Come well-rested.

orthopedic_consultation.name: Orthopedic Consultation
orthopedic_consultation.description: Bone, joint, and musculoskeletal system evaluation
orthopedic_consultation.what_is_included: Assessment of joint and bone health, evaluation of pain or injury, movement assessment
orthopedic_consultation.how_its_done: Orthopedist will examine the affected area, test range of motion, and provide treatment recommendations.
orthopedic_consultation.special_preparation: Wear shorts or comfortable pants. Bring any X-rays or imaging results. Avoid strenuous activity before visit.

thyroid_ultrasound.name: Thyroid Ultrasound
thyroid_ultrasound.description: Ultrasound imaging of the thyroid gland
thyroid_ultrasound.what_is_included: Complete thyroid ultrasound, assessment of gland size and structure
thyroid_ultrasound.how_its_done: Non-invasive ultrasound procedure. Gel applied to neck area. Detailed images captured and analyzed.
thyroid_ultrasound.special_preparation: No special preparation needed. Wear comfortable clothing with easy neck access.
